protocolversion.description: Your Minecraft server's protocol version number (more info: https://wiki.vg/Protocol_version_numbers)

pinginterval.description: How often you want the Discord bot to retrieve your Minecraft server's status, in seconds (default: 30)

maxplayers.description: The displayed max number of players online. 'default' sets this number to the Minecraft server's maximum capacity, 'memberCount' sets this number to the Discord server's member count, and an integer will display a static number
